Core gameplay is the problem

Everyone wants something from a game, we all want more. But you want the game to add things or maybe add a different gamemode before it gets stale and you move on. I'm at that point with Dead by Daylight. I don't feel like I have hope for the people that made this game are going to be rational enough. With all the DLC money and microtransactions and other games they are working on making. They don't really care or really have to care. I looked at a dev stream felt hopeful about the patch like everyone else gave my hopes up. They just don't get it. It's in the buisness of misery borderline. I don't feel accomplished or really happy at all. People play this game, the people that play it the most hate it more. 


This game is missing something crucial, aesthetically it is a horror game, but gameplay wise it's a running simulator with generators. And yeah killer whatever I've played both roles and it boring.  

The ability for the survivors to pick up weapons (bats, knives,  a gun flaregun) and fight back or sabotage the killer.

Perks don't fix gameplay mechanic problems and I'm tired of buying DLC over and over.

Windows, pallets, generators, and hooks. Jason Vorhees wouldn't belong in this game, it wouldn't sit right with me. We're scraping the bottom of the barrel creativity wise. 

It emphasizes the chase over the fight but really the chases were more you'd knock over shelves, chairs, throw stuff at the killer, maybe stab them in the back or something, knock their mask off, anything. I was watching friday the 13th yesterday.

You buy stun grenades, you buy locker stuns, you don't really earn them. You might grind but it all feels like poo. It's all an afterthought.
Muito bom tmnc jogo bom do krl

Really fun game, might want to make you throw your monitor across the room every now and then but the satisfaction you get from juking and making fun of the killer makes all of the suffering very much worth it.

Yeah, lots of toxic people in this game at every rating of play. If you wanna play with people who play like dicks 24/7 then play it, but I'm not going to recommend playing a game where it's seemingly encouraged by the developers to act toxic to absolutely everyone else. Almost everything that is reportable- people are going to do and get away with doing, have fun with the worst community since League of Legends.

p.s. There's a lot of virtue signaling by the community and developers.

I have always been severely neglected my entire life. In my early childhood I would cope with this trauma by enacting violence unto my fellow classmates and innocent animals. Now I have a game where I can show how merciless I can be. This world has yet to see my true self: a killer. >:0
play game with friends and family, is fun
One of the worst 'finished' games i played. built against any type of balancing

It's definitely a meme at this point, but it's true. People who love this game, hate this game.

I'm not going to make any claims about the gameplay, as that is always changing, for better or worse. But I am going to say this, Fuck Behavior.

Behavior Interactive consistently ignores the wishes of the community, which is a spit in the face of all who play, as this game relies on the community. A majority of the issues most of the players have with the game are often solved by those same players. I've never seen a community that has put more thought into solving gameplay issues than the DBD community. But Behavior. in stark contrast, takes ages to address issues that the community cries out about, and once they do make changes, it's in such a strange direction that it often creates more problems than it addresses.

The other major criticism I have is that most of the content is blocked behind a paywall. The roster of characters you start out with is solid, but more than half the characters are only available through micro-transactions or lots of grinding.

I love this game, it's pretty much the Smash Bros of horror, and has amazing stories and aesthetics, but the way Behavior treats this game ruins it. Do not buy this game, it only incentivize companies to do more shit like this.
